name: Tallium Inc.
tagline: Charging your ideas with technical excellence
description:
Tallium Inc. is a trusted partner for your business innovations.
We are focused on crafting custom mobile and web applications for both startups and enterprises, assisting our awesome clients and partners all the way from concept and design to finished product, launch, and maintenance.
Â 
Our close-knit team consists of 45 IT experts including professional graphic designers, top-skilled developers, QA engineers, project managers, marketing specialists, and business analysts. We have extensive expertise in creating functional and large-scale marketplaces, social platforms, engaging mobile applications and deep knowledge of AI, gamification mechanics, geomarketing and VR/AR technologies.
We also gladly share our expertise in building reference development processes and provide services of staff augmentation to enhance existing teams with our best specialists.
Working with customers from all over the world, we promote innovation, push the boundaries of design and use only the latest technologies to charge great ideas with technical excellence and flawless execution.
